header.title: MSSTI Quick Language
header.description: This file provides instructions for upgrading the MOD from version 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 See the main install file for any additional information about the MOD.

action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT !
Log on to Administration Control Panel
##################################################################### A) Purge theme :
A.1) Navigate to "STYLES" Tab. A.2) Under "STYLE COMPONENTS" click on "Templates". A.3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". A.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes". ( Repeat last 2 steps to each instaled style, based off Subsilver2 ).
##################################################################### B) Clear cache :
B.1) Navigate to "GENERAL" Tab. B.2) find "Purge the cache" click on "Run now". B.3) in the next screen, click on "Yes".
##################################################################### C) Enjoy it !.
